A

addMetricMessages(List<ProducerRecord<?, ?>>, SortedMap<String, T>, String, Date, JsonGenerator, StringWriter) - Method in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization.JSONStringSerializer
Given a generic collection of metrics of varying types, converts them to JSON including an ISO 8601 formatted timestamp, creates corresponding ProducerRecords for sending to Kafka, and adds them to the given message list.

B

build(Producer<?, ?>) - Method in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.KafkaReporter.Builder
Builds a KafkaReporter with the given properties, sending metrics using the provided Kafka Java Producer (Kafka versions 0.8.2 and later.)

Convert durations to the given time unit.
convertRatesTo(TimeUnit) - Method in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.KafkaReporter.Builder
Convert rates to the given time unit.

DEFAULT_TOPIC - Static variable in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.KafkaReporter

filter(MetricFilter) - Method in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.KafkaReporter.Builder

forRegistry(MetricRegistry) - Static method in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.KafkaReporter
Returns a new KafkaReporter.Builder for KafkaReporter.

K

KafkaMetricsSerializer - Interface in io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization
An interface to convert Metrics to Kafka messages (as key/value encompassing ProducerRecords.)
KafkaReporter - Class in io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka
A reporter which publishes metric values to an Apache Kafka Topic.
KafkaReporter.Builder - Class in io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka
A builder for KafkaReporter instances.

S

serialize(SortedMap<String, Gauge>, SortedMap<String, Counter>, SortedMap<String, Histogram>, SortedMap<String, Meter>, SortedMap<String, Timer>, String, Date, TimeUnit, TimeUnit) - Method in class io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization.JSONStringSerializer
 
serialize(SortedMap<String, Gauge>, SortedMap<String, Counter>, SortedMap<String, Histogram>, SortedMap<String, Meter>, SortedMap<String, Timer>, String, Date, TimeUnit, TimeUnit) - Method in interface io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization.KafkaMetricsSerializer
Given maps of the metrics to report (one per type: gauges, counters, histograms, meters, and timers) returns a list of corresponding messages that should be posted to Apache Kafka.
